mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_NO, NAME, USER_ID, USER_PW, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, METHOD) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, 'NORMAL' )

INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_NO, NAME, USER_ID, EMAIL, PHONE, METHOD, SOCIAL_USER_IDENTIFIER) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, 'N_' || SEQ_NAVER_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{phone}, #{method}, #{socialUserIdentifier} )

INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_NO, NAME, USER_ID, EMAIL, METHOD, SOCIAL_USER_IDENTIFIER) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, 'G_' || SEQ_GOOGLE_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{method}, #{socialUserIdentifier} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, NAME, USER_ID, USER_PW, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, METHOD, GRADE FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND METHOD = 'NORMAL' AND USER_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT USER_ID, USER_STATUS FROM USER_INFO WHERE (EMAIL = #{authMethod} OR PHONE = #{authMethod}) AND METHOD = 'NORMAL'
SELECT USER_NO, NAME, USER_ID, USER_PW, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_STATUS, METHOD, GRADE FROM USER_INFO
SELECT USER_NO, NAME, USER_ID, USER_PW, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_STATUS, METHOD, GRADE FROM USER_INFO WHERE NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_PW = #{userPw}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, GRADE = #{grade} WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, NAME, USER_ID, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, METHOD, GRADE FROM USER_INFO WHERE SOCIAL_USER_IDENTIFIER = #{socialUserIdentifier} AND USER_STATUS='N'
